16953359Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string IntToString(int value, char[] baseChars)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string result = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    int targetBase = baseChars.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int currentValue = value % targetBase;Di2015NewLine        result = baseChars[currentValue] + result;Di2015NewLine        value = value - currentValue; //possibly not necessary due to integer division rounding down anywayDi2015NewLine        value = value / targetBase;Di2015NewLine        value = value - 1;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    while (value > -1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

If this flag is not specified, WM_NCCALCSIZE is sent only when the window's size is being changed.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            SWP_FRAMECHANGED = 0x0020,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            ///     Hides the window.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            SWP_HIDEWINDOW = 0x0080,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            ///     Does not activate the window. If this flag is not set, the window is activated and moved to the top of either the topmost or non-topmost group (depending on the setting of the hWndInsertAfter parameter).Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            SWP_NOACTIVATE = 0x0010,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            ///     Discards the entire contents of the client area. If this flag is not specified, the valid contents of the client area are saved and copied back into the client area after the window is sized or repositioned.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            SWP_NOCOPYBITS = 0x0100,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            ///     Retains the current position (ignores X and Y parameters).Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            SWP_NOMOVE = 0x0002,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            ///     Does not change the owner window's position in the Z order.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            SWP_NOOWNERZORDER = 0x0200,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            ///     Does not redraw changes. If this flag is set, no repainting of any kind occurs. This applies to the client area, the nonclient area (including the title bar and scroll bars), and any part of the parent window uncovered as a result of the window being moved. When this flag is set, the application must explicitly invalidate or redraw any parts of the window and parent window that need redrawing.Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine      SWP_NOREPOSITION = 0x0200,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            ///     Prevents the window from receiving the WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING message.Di2015NewLine restore InconsistentNamingDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine        [return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLine        static 16963752Di2015UniqueSeparatorAttach()
16963752Di2015UniqueSeparatorDbContext
16963752Di2015UniqueSeparatorDbContext.SaveChanges()
16963752Di2015UniqueSeparator        Foo foo=null;Di2015NewLine        using (var db = new MyContext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            db.Foos.Add( new Foo { MyValue = OLD_VALUE } );Di2015NewLine            db.SaveChanges();   // foo written to DB with MyValue = OLD_VALUEDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foo = db.Foos.FirstOrDefault(); // grab fooDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // leave context and update foo...Di2015NewLine        foo.MyValue = NEW_VALUE;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var db = new MyContext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            db.Foos.Attach(foo);    // foo is attached in the 'unchanged' state...Di2015NewLine            db.SaveChanges();       // ...so this statement has no effectDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // At this point, db.Foos.FirstOrDefault().MyValue will be NEW_VALUE, yetDi2015NewLine            // the "real" value of the object in the DB is OLD_VALUE.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            db.Entry(foo).State = EntityState.Modified; // setting foo to "Modified" will cause...Di2015NewLine            db.SaveChanges();                           // ...foo to be written out with NEW_VALUEDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

16964323Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class AsyncTaskCodeActivity<T> : AsyncCodeActivity<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected sealed override IAsyncResult BeginExecute(AsyncCodeActivityContext context, AsyncCallback callback, object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var task = ExecuteAsync(context);Di2015NewLine        var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<T>(state);Di2015NewLine        task.ContinueWith(t =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (t.IsFaulted)Di2015NewLine                tcs.TrySetException(t.Exception.InnerExceptions);Di2015NewLine            else if (t.IsCanceled)Di2015NewLine                tcs.TrySetCanceled();Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                tcs.TrySetResult(t.Result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (callback != null)Di2015NewLine                callback(tcs.Task);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected sealed override T EndExecute(AsyncCodeActivityContext context, IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var task = (Task<T>)result;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return task.Result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (AggregateException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ExceptionDispatchInfo.Capture(ex.InnerException).Throw();Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected abstract Task<T> ExecuteAsync(AsyncCodeActivityContext context);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16967286Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string HexToDecimal(string hex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> dec = new List<int> { 0 };   // decimal resultDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (char c in hex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int carry = Convert.ToInt32(c.ToString(), 16);   Di2015NewLine            // initially holds decimal value of current hex digit;Di2015NewLine            // subsequently holds carry-over for multiplicationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < dec.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int val = dec[i] * 16 + carry;Di2015NewLine            dec[i] = val % 10;Di2015NewLine            carry = val / 10;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (carry > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dec.Add(carry % 10);Di2015NewLine            carry /= 10;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var chars = dec.Select(d => (char)('0' + d));Di2015NewLine    var cArr = chars.Reverse().ToArray();Di2015NewLine    return new string(cArr);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16981138Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void TransposeSquareMatrixInPlace(int[,] matrix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (matrix == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("matrix");Di2015NewLine    if (matrix.GetLength(0) != matrix.GetLength(1)) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("matrix", "matrix is not square");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int size = matrix.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int n = 0; n < (size-1); ++n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int m = n+1; m < size; ++m)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int temp = matrix[n, m];Di2015NewLine            matrix[n, m] = matrix[m, n];Di2015NewLine            matrix[m, n] = temp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16981542Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic T AssertReadWorks<T>(Di2015NewLine    IRepository<T> repository,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, bool> keyComparer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return repository.GetAll().Single(keyComparer);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16982411Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Copy(string sourceFileName, string destFileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (sourceFileName == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("sourceFileName", Environment.GetResourceString("ArgumentNull_FileName"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (destFileName == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("destFileName", Environment.GetResourceString("ArgumentNull_FileName"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (sourceFileName.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Environment.GetResourceString("Argument_EmptyFileName"), "sourceFileName");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (destFileName.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Environment.GetResourceString("Argument_EmptyFileName"), "destFileName");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    InternalCopy(sourceFileName, destFileName, false, true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16982411Di2015UniqueSeparator[SecuritySafeCritical]Di2015NewLineinternal static string InternalCopy(string sourceFileName, string destFileName, bool overwrite, bool checkHost)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string fullPathInternal = Path.GetFullPathInternal(sourceFileName);Di2015NewLine    string dst = Path.GetFullPathInternal(destFileName);Di2015NewLine    new FileIOPermission(FileIOPermissionAccess.Read, new string[] { fullPathInternal }, false, false).Demand();Di2015NewLine    new FileIOPermission(FileIOPermissionAccess.Write, new string[] { dst }, false, false).Demand();Di2015NewLine    if (!Win32Native.CopyFile(fullPathInternal, dst, !overwrite))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int errorCode = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine        string maybeFullPath = destFileName;Di2015NewLine        if (errorCode != 80)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (SafeFileHandle handle = Win32Native.UnsafeCreateFile(fullPathInternal, -2147483648, FileShare.Read, null, FileMode.Open, 0, IntPtr.Zero))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (handle.IsInvalid)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    maybeFullPath = sourceFileName;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if ((errorCode == 5) && Directory.InternalExists(dst))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new IOException(Environment.GetResourceString("Arg_FileIsDirectory_Name", new object[] { destFileName }), 5, dst);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        __Error.WinIOError(errorCode, maybeFullPath);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return dst;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16985858Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Action<AdStatsItem, AdStatsItem> GetAggregateUpdaterDi2015NewLine       (IEnumerable<Expression<Func<AdStatsItem, int>>> metricGetters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var aggregate = Expression.Parameter(typeof(AdStatsItem), "aggregate");Di2015NewLine    var delta = Expression.Parameter(typeof(AdStatsItem), "delta");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var increments = from metricGetter in metricGettersDi2015NewLine                     let memberExpression = (MemberExpression)metricGetter.BodyDi2015NewLine                     let property = (PropertyInfo)memberExpression.MemberDi2015NewLine                     select Expression.AddAssignDi2015NewLine                             (Expression.Property(aggregate, property),Di2015NewLine                              Expression.Property(delta, property));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Action<AdStatsItem, AdStatsItem>>Di2015NewLine                 (Expression.Block(increments), aggregate, delta);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16985858Di2015UniqueSeparator.Lambda #Lambda1<System.Action`2[AdStatsItem,AdStatsItem]>(Di2015NewLine    AdStatsItem $aggregate,Di2015NewLine    AdStatsItem $delta) {Di2015NewLine    .Block() {Di2015NewLine        $aggregate.Impressions += $delta.Impressions;Di2015NewLine        $aggregate.Clicks += $delta.Clicks;Di2015NewLine        $aggregate.Spent += $delta.SpentDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16986546Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetAll
16986546Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class VariableSubstitutionVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ParameterExpression _parameter;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ConstantExpression _constant;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public VariableSubstitutionVisitor(ParameterExpression parameter, ConstantExpression constant)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _parameter = parameter;Di2015NewLine        _constant = constant;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node == _parameter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _constant;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16986546Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetSingle
16986546Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic T GetSingle(IRepository<T> repository, Expression<Func<T, T, bool>> predicate, T entity)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Create a new representation of predicate that will take just one parameter and capture entityDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get just the body of the supplied expressionDi2015NewLine    var body = predicate.Body;Di2015NewLine    //Make a new visitor to replace the second parameter with the supplied valueDi2015NewLine    var substitutionVisitor = new VariableSubstitutionVisitor(predicate.Parameters[1], Expression.Constant(entity, typeof(T)));Di2015NewLine    //Create an expression that represents the predicate with the second parameter replaced with the supplied entityDi2015NewLine    var visitedBody = substitutionVisitor.Visit(body).Reduce();Di2015NewLine    //Make the new expression into something that could be a Func<T, bool>Di2015NewLine    var newBody = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(visitedBody, predicate.Parameters[0]); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Now, create something that will call Enumerable.Single on the result of GetAll from the repository, supplying the new predicateDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Make a place to hold the result of GetAllDi2015NewLine    var resultsParameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof (IEnumerable<T>));Di2015NewLine    //Make an expression that calls the Single extension methodDi2015NewLine    var singleExpression = Expression.Call(((Func<IEnumerable<T>, Func<T, bool>, T>)Enumerable.Single).Method, resultsParameter, newBody);Di2015NewLine    //Make a Func<IEnumerable<T>, T> that return the result of the call of Single on the results of the GetAll methodDi2015NewLine    var compiled = Expression.Lambda<Func<IEnumerable<T>, T>>(singleExpression, resultsParameter).Compile();Di2015NewLine    //Call GetAll, letting the new method that we've got run the supplied predicate without having to run an Invoke type expressionDi2015NewLine    return compiled(repository.GetAll()); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16986657Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic
16986657Di2015UniqueSeparatorOutside.Inside in = new Outside.Inside();Di2015NewLine

16986883Di2015UniqueSeparator public JsonResult GetData(int? Id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<sp_data_R_Result> tableData;Di2015NewLine        if (assetId != null)Di2015NewLine            tableData = DBData.Where(x => x.Id== Id).ToList();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            tableData = DBData.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var res = new JsonResultDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            JsonRequestBehavior = JsonRequestBehavior.AllowGet,Di2015NewLine            Data = newDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        aaData = from d in tableDataDi2015NewLine                                 select new object[]Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                  d.col1,Di2015NewLine                                  d.col2,Di2015NewLine                                  ...Di2015NewLine                                 }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return res;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16995845Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic async static Task<List<uspGetEmployees_Result>> GetEmployess(int professionalID, int startIndex, int pageSize, string where, string equals)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var httpCurrent = HttpContext.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Most of these operations are unlikely to be time-consuming,Di2015NewLine    // so why await the whole thing?Di2015NewLine    using (AFCCInc_ComEntities db = new AFCCInc_ComEntities())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // I don't really know what exactly uspGetEmployees returnsDi2015NewLine        // and, if it's an IEnumerable, whether it yields its elements lazily.Di2015NewLine        // The fact that it can be null, however, bothers me, so I'll sidestep it.Di2015NewLine        List<uspGetEmployees_Result> emps = await Task.Run(() =>Di2015NewLine            (db.uspGetEmployees(professionalID, startIndex, pageSize, where, equals) ?? Enumerable.Empty<uspGetEmployees_Result>()).ToList()Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // I'm assuming that BuildUserFilePath returns string - no async.Di2015NewLine        await Task.Run(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Parallel.ForEach(emps, e =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // NO async/await within the ForEach delegate body.Di2015NewLine                e.Avatar = BuildUserFilePath(e.Avatar, e.UserId, httpCurrent, true);Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16996176Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask<ProcessorArchitecture> WhatProcessor()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var t = new TaskCompletionSource<ProcessorArchitecture>();Di2015NewLine    var w = new WebView();Di2015NewLine    w.AllowedScriptNotifyUris = WebView.AnyScriptNotifyUri;Di2015NewLine    w.NavigateToString("<html />");Di2015NewLine    NotifyEventHandler h = null;Di2015NewLine    h = (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // http://blogs.msdn.com/b/ie/archive/2012/07/12/ie10-user-agent-string-update.aspxDi2015NewLine        // IE10 on Windows RT: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 10.0; Windows NT 6.2; ARM; Trident/6.0;)Di2015NewLine        // 32-bit IE10 on 64-bit Windows: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 10.0; Windows NT 6.2; WOW64; Trident/6.0)Di2015NewLine        // 64-bit IE10 on 64-bit Windows: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 10.0; Windows NT 6.2; Win64; x64; Trident/6.0)Di2015NewLine        // 32-bit IE10 on 32-bit Windows: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 10.0; Windows NT 6.2; Trident/6.0) Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (e.Value.Contains("ARM;"))Di2015NewLine                t.SetResult(Windows.System.ProcessorArchitecture.Arm);Di2015NewLine            else if (e.Value.Contains("WOW64;") || e.Value.Contains("Win64;") || e.Value.Contains("x64;"))Di2015NewLine                t.SetResult(Windows.System.ProcessorArchitecture.X64);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                t.SetResult(Windows.System.ProcessorArchitecture.X86);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex) { t.SetException(ex); }Di2015NewLine        finally { /* release */ w.ScriptNotify -= h; }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    w.ScriptNotify += h;Di2015NewLine    w.InvokeScript("execScript", new[] { "window.external.notify(navigator.userAgent); " });Di2015NewLine    return t.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16996331Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble
16996331Di2015UniqueSeparatorMath.Pow
16996331Di2015UniqueSeparatorMath.Log
16996331Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static long[] GetBTreeChildren(long? parentMask)Di2015NewLine{            Di2015NewLine    var branches = new List<long>();Di2015NewLine    if (parentMask == null) return branches.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < 63; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( (parentMask & (1L << i)) != 0)Di2015NewLine            branches.Add(1L << i);Di2015NewLine    }            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return branches.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16996331Di2015UniqueSeparator(long) 1 << i

16998712Di2015UniqueSeparator    static byte[] ToArrayOfByteValues(this string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var charArray = str.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        var byteArray = new byte[charArray.Length / 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < byteArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var q = new StringBuilder().Append(charArray.Skip(i * 2).Take(2).ToArray<char>()).ToString();Di2015NewLine            byteArray[i] = Byte.Parse(q, System.Globalization.NumberStyles.HexNumber);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return byteArray;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
16998801Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ConnectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // internal details of the connection; should not be public.Di2015NewLine    protected object _client;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // base class constructorDi2015NewLine    public Connection(object client) { _client = client; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // copying constructorDi2015NewLine    public Connection(Connection other) : this(other._client) { }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass AuthenticatedConnection : ConnectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // broken constructor?Di2015NewLine    public AuthenticatedConnection(string token, Connection connection)Di2015NewLine        : base(connection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // use token etcDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16999235Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool IsInsideCircle(Point CirclePos, float CircleRad, Point checkPoint)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (Math.Sqrt(Math.Pow((CirclePos.X - checkPoint.X), 2) +Di2015NewLine                  Math.Pow((CirclePos.Y - checkPoint.Y), 2)) < CircleRad)Di2015NewLine    { return true; } else return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool IsIntersecting(Point CirclePos, float CircleRad, Point LineStart, Di2015NewLine                                                              Point LineEnd)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (IsInsideCircle(CirclePos, CircleRad, LineStart) ^Di2015NewLine        IsInsideCircle(CirclePos, CircleRad, LineEnd)) Di2015NewLine    { return true; } else return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16999235Di2015UniqueSeparator^
16999235Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate int Intersect (Point CirclePos, float CircleRad, Di2015NewLine                       Point LineStart, Point LineEnd, ref Point Intersection)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (IsIntersecting(CirclePos, CircleRad, LineStart, LineEnd)) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Calculate terms of the linear and quadratic equationsDi2015NewLine        var M = (LineEnd.Y - LineStart.Y) / (LineEnd.X - LineStart.X);Di2015NewLine        var B = LineStart.Y - M * LineStart.X;Di2015NewLine        var a = 1 + M*M;Di2015NewLine        var b = 2 * (M*B - M*CirclePos.Y - CirclePos.X);Di2015NewLine        var c = CirclePos.X * CirclePos.X + B * B +  CirclePos.Y * CirclePos.Y -Di2015NewLine                CircleRad * CircleRad - 2 * B * CirclePos.Y;Di2015NewLine        // solve quadratic equationDi2015NewLine        var sqRtTerm = Math.Sqrt(b * b - 4 * a * c);Di2015NewLine        var x = ((-b) + sqRtTerm)/(2*a);Di2015NewLine        // make sure we have the correct root for our line segmentDi2015NewLine        if ((x < LineStart.X) || (x > LineEnd.X)){ x = ((-b) - sqRtTerm)/(2*a); }Di2015NewLine        //solve for the y-componentDi2015NewLine        var y = M * x + B;Di2015NewLine        // Intersection CalculatedDi2015NewLine        Intersection = new Point(x, y);Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        // Line segment does not intersect at one point.  It is either fully outside,Di2015NewLine        // fully inside, intersects at two points, is tangential to, or one or moreDi2015NewLine        // points is exactly on the circle radius.Di2015NewLine        Intersection = new Point(0, 0);Di2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLine    }            Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16999940Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Task<IEnumerable<Exception>> ExecuteOnServersAsync(Di2015NewLine    IList<IEnumerable<Connection>> dbConnByServer,Di2015NewLine    string sql, object parameters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tasks = new List<Task>();Di2015NewLine    var exceptions = new ConcurrentQueue<Exception>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Action<Task> handleException = t =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (t.IsFaulted)Di2015NewLine            exceptions.Enqueue(t.Exception);Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var dbConns in dbConnByServer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Task task = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var dbConn in dbConns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sqlUtil = m_sqlUtilProvider.Get(dbConn);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (task == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                task = sqlUtil.ExecuteSqlAsync(sql, parameters);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                task = task.ContinueWith(Di2015NewLine                    t =>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        handleException(t);Di2015NewLine                        return sqlUtil.ExecuteSqlAsync(sql, parameters);Di2015NewLine                    }).Unwrap();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (task != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            task = task.ContinueWith(handleException);Di2015NewLine            tasks.Add(task);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Task.Factory.ContinueWhenAll(Di2015NewLine        tasks.ToArray(), _ => exceptions.AsEnumerable());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17000906Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar result = BuildTree(0, GetRequestTreeNodes());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public List<MessageElement> BuildTree(int depth, List<MessageElement> messageElements)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (messageElements == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return (Di2015NewLine                  from element in BuildGrouping(depth, messageElements)           // Ex:(1, "NetworkControl.AlternateIndexText.Value")Di2015NewLine                  let elementId = element.Key                      // get id from message elementDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  select new MessageElement()Di2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                      ID = depth,                                  // id of each path  Ex: 1 => "NetworkControl.AlternateIndexText.Value"Di2015NewLine                      Name = element.Key,             //name of each tree node to be displayed on treeDi2015NewLine                      Children = BuildTree(depth +1,                    //create child from the propertyPathDi2015NewLine                        element.ToList<MessageElement>())Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLine                  ).ToList<MessageElement>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<IGrouping<string, MessageElement>> BuildGrouping(int depth, List<MessageElement> messageElements)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string key = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            if (messageElements != null && messageElements.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string[] splits = messageElements[0].path.Split('.');Di2015NewLine                if (splits.Length > depth)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    key = splits[depth];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new List<IGrouping<string, MessageElement>>();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return from element in messageElements group element by element.path.Split('.')[depth];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

17001635Di2015UniqueSeparator public Ray CalculateCursorRay(Matrix projectionMatrix, Matrix viewMatrix)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Position is your mouse positionDi2015NewLine        Vector3 nearSource = new Vector3(Position, 0f);Di2015NewLine        Vector3 farSource = new Vector3(Position, 1f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Vector3 nearPoint = GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Unproject(nearSource,Di2015NewLine            projectionMatrix, viewMatrix, Matrix.Identity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Vector3 farPoint = GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Unproject(farSource,Di2015NewLine            projectionMatrix, viewMatrix, Matrix.Identity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Vector3 direction = farPoint - nearPoint;Di2015NewLine        direction.Normalize();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Ray(nearPoint, direction);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17003281Di2015UniqueSeparator// Side note - your simMethod argument doesn't seem to be used.Di2015NewLinepublic SimMatrix(string sparseMethod, string simMethod, Phrases phrases, DistrFeature features, int topK)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> rows = new List<int>(phrases.uniquePhraseCount * topK);Di2015NewLine    List<int> cols = new List<int>(phrases.uniquePhraseCount * topK);Di2015NewLine    List<double> vals = new List<double>(phrases.uniquePhraseCount * topK);Di2015NewLine    if (sparseMethod.Equals("invIdx"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < phrases.uniquePhraseCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        { //loop through all phrasesDi2015NewLine            using (SparseDoubleArray row = phrases.feature_values.GetRowSparse(i))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (phrases.feature_values.RowLength(i) > 0)Di2015NewLine                { //i.e., at least one feature fired for phraseDi2015NewLine                    // Declare your temporary collections when they're initializedDi2015NewLine                    IEnumerable<int> nonzeros = row.Elements.Select(pmi => pmi.IndexList[1]);Di2015NewLine                    var neighbors = generateNeighbors(nonzeros, features.inverted_idx);Di2015NewLine                    IEnumerable<double> simVals = neighbors.Select(x => cosineSimilarity(row, phrases.feature_values.GetRowSparse(x)));Di2015NewLine                    var sortedIdxSim = neighbors.Zip(simVals, (a, b) => new { idx = a, sim = b }).OrderByDescending(pair => pair.sim);Di2015NewLine                    IEnumerable<int> sortedIdx = sortedIdxSim.Select(pair => pair.idx);Di2015NewLine                    IEnumerable<double> sortedSim = sortedIdxSim.Select(pair => pair.sim);Di2015NewLine                    int sortedInxSimCount = sortedIdxSim.Count();Di2015NewLine                    int topN = (sortedInxSimCount < topK) ? sortedInxSimCount : topK;Di2015NewLine                    rows.AddRange(Enumerable.Repeat(i, topN));Di2015NewLine                    cols.AddRange(sortedIdx.Take(topN));Di2015NewLine                    vals.AddRange(sortedSim.Take(topN));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                { //just add self similarityDi2015NewLine                    rows.Add(i);Di2015NewLine                    cols.Add(i);Di2015NewLine                    vals.Add(1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0} phrases done", i + 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else { Console.WriteLine("Sorry, no other sparsification method implemented thus far"); }Di2015NewLine    simMat = new SparseDoubleArray(phrases.uniquePhraseCount, phrases.uniquePhraseCount, rows, cols, vals);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic private List<int> generateNeighbors(IEnumerable<int> idx, Dictionary<int, List<int>> inverted_idx)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Doing it this way will reduce memory usage since you won't be creating a bunch of temporaryDi2015NewLine    // collections, adding them to an existing collection, then creating a brand new collectionDi2015NewLine    // from it that is smaller... I think that may have been spiking your memory usage quite a bit.Di2015NewLine    return inverted_idx.Where(x => idx.Contains(x.Key)).SelectMany(x => x.Value).Distinct().ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17011400Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Chromosome
17011400Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Chromosome : IEquatable<Chromosome>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool[][] body { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public double fitness { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool IEquatable<Chromosome>.Equals(Chromosome other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Compare fitnessDi2015NewLine        if(fitness != other.fitness) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Make sure we don't get IndexOutOfBounds on one of themDi2015NewLine        if(body.Length != other.body.Length) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(var x = 0; x < body.Length; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // IndexOutOfBounds on inner arraysDi2015NewLine            if(body[x].Length != other.body[x].Length) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for(var y = 0; y < body[x].Length; y++)Di2015NewLine                // Compare bodiesDi2015NewLine                if(body[x][y] != other.body[x][y]) return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // No difference foundDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ReSharper's suggestion for equality membersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(null, obj))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(this, obj))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (obj.GetType() != this.GetType())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return this.Equals((Chromosome)obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        uncheckedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ((this.body != null ? this.body.GetHashCode() : 0) * 397) ^ this.fitness.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17013755Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ChartDataRecordCollectionConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Writes the JSON representation of the object.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="writer">The <see cref="T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonWriter"/> to write to.</param><param name="value">The value.</param><param name="serializer">The calling serializer.</param>Di2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var set = (ChartDataRecordCollection) value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writer.WriteStartObject();Di2015NewLine        writer.WritePropertyName("data");Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteStartArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Group up the records in the collection by the 'date' propertyDi2015NewLine        foreach (var record in set.GroupBy(x => x.date))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteStartObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            writer.WritePropertyName("date");Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteValue(record.Key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Write the graph/value pairs as properties and valuesDi2015NewLine            foreach (var part in record)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.WritePropertyName(part.graph);Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteValue(part.value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            writer.WriteEndObject();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writer.WriteEndArray();Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteEndObject();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Reads the JSON representation of the object.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="reader">The <see cref="T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader"/> to read from.</param><param name="objectType">Type of the object.</param><param name="existingValue">The existing value of object being read.</param><param name="serializer">The calling serializer.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// The object value.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = new ChartDataRecordCollection();Di2015NewLine        var obj = JObject.Load(reader);Di2015NewLine        var container = obj["data"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Examine each object in the array of values from the resultDi2015NewLine        foreach (JObject item in container)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Get and store the date propertyDi2015NewLine            var date = item["date"].Value<long>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //For each property that is not the date property on the object, construct aDi2015NewLine            //  ChartDataRecord with the appropriate graph/value pairDi2015NewLine            foreach (var property in item.Properties())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (property.Name == "date")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result.Add(new ChartDataRecordDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    date = date,Di2015NewLine                    graph = property.Name,Di2015NewLine                    value = item[property.Name].Value<int>()Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Determines whether this instance can convert the specified object type.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="objectType">Type of the object.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <c>true</c> if this instance can convert the specified object type; otherwise, <c>false</c>.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return objectType == typeof (ChartDataRecordCollection);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17014915Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class OtherInfo: IXmlSerializableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Info1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Info2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema GetSchema()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader reader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var content = reader.ReadElementContentAsString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(content))Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var infos = content.Split(':');Di2015NewLine        if (infos.Length < 2)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.Info1 = infos[0];Di2015NewLine        this.Info2 = infos[1];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter writer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteString(String.Format("{0}:{1}", this.Info1, this.Info2));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17014915Di2015UniqueSeparatorOtherInfo
17014915Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class OtherInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [XmlIgnore]Di2015NewLine    public string Info1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    [XmlIgnore]Di2015NewLine    public string Info2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [XmlText]Di2015NewLine    public string InfoStringDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return String.Format("{0}:{1}", this.Info1, this.Info2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(value))Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var infos = value.Split(':');Di2015NewLine            if (infos.Length < 2)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.Info1 = infos[0];Di2015NewLine            this.Info2 = infos[1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17015203Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar query = from user in context.UsersDi2015NewLine            let previousUser = context.UsersDi2015NewLine                .Where( u => u.SignUpDate < user.SignUpDate )Di2015NewLine                .OrderBy( u => u.SignUpDate )Di2015NewLine                .FirstOrDefault()Di2015NewLine            select newDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                User = user,Di2015NewLine                PreviousUser = previousUser,Di2015NewLine                IsDuplicate = previousUser != null && previousUser.UserType != user.UserType,Di2015NewLine                SignUpDaysApart = user.SignUpDate.Subtract( previousUser.SignUpDate )Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine

17016505Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomPropertyEqualityComparer<T>: IEqualityComparer<T> where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string[] _selectedComparisonProperties;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CustomPropertyEqualityComparer(params string[] selectedComparisonProperties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _selectedComparisonProperties = selectedComparisonProperties;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x != null && y != null && x.GetType() == y.GetType())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var type = x.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var comparableProperties = new List<string>(_selectedComparisonProperties);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var objectProperties = type.GetProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var relevantProperties = objectProperties.Where(propertyInfo => comparableProperties.Contains(propertyInfo.Name));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var propertyInfo in relevantProperties)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var xPropertyValue = type.GetProperty(propertyInfo.Name).GetValue(x, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var yPropertyValue = type.GetProperty(propertyInfo.Name).GetValue(y, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (xPropertyValue != yPropertyValue && (xPropertyValue == null || !xPropertyValue.Equals(yPropertyValue)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return x == y;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(T obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var objectProperties = type.GetProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return objectProperties.Sum(property => property.GetHashCode());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17019186Di2015UniqueSeparatorunsafe String Reverse(String s)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char[] sarr = new char[s.Length];Di2015NewLine            int idx = s.Length;Di2015NewLine            fixed (char* c = s)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                char* c1 = c;Di2015NewLine                while (idx != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sarr[--idx] = *c1++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new String(sarr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
17019186Di2015UniqueSeparatorunsafe String Reverse(String s)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char[] sarr = new char[s.Length];Di2015NewLine            fixed (char* c = s)Di2015NewLine            fixed (char* d = sarr)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                char* c1 = c;Di2015NewLine                char* d1 = d + s.Length;Di2015NewLine                while (d1 > d)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    *--d1 = *c1++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new String(sarr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

17020048Di2015UniqueSeparator//parse out hex digits in calling codeDi2015NewLinestatic long NextHash(HashSet<long> hashes, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    System.Security.Cryptography.MD5 md5 = System.Security.Cryptography.MD5.Create();Di2015NewLine    long l = BitConverter.ToInt64(md5.ComputeHash(IntToArray(count)));Di2015NewLine    if(!hashes.Contains(l)){Di2015NewLine        hashes.Add(l);Di2015NewLine        return l;Di2015NewLine    } else return -1; //check this in calling code for failureDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic byte[] IntToArray(int i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine    for(int j=0;j<4;j++){Di2015NewLine    bytes[j] = (byte)i;Di2015NewLine    i>>=8;    Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17020255Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string sanitizeText(string sanitize){Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder result = new  StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        foreach(   char x in sanitize){Di2015NewLine        if ((x == 0x9 || x == 0xA || x == 0xD) ||   Di2015NewLine        ((x >= 0x20) && (x <= 0xD7FF)) ||   Di2015NewLine        ((x >= 0xE000) && (x <= 0xFFFD)) ||   Di2015NewLine        ((x >= 0x10000) && (x <= 0x10FFFF)))  result.Append(x);Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17031865Di2015UniqueSeparator// Example use: return entities.Entities.Where(ExpressionTransformer<IEntity,Entity>.Transform(filter));Di2015NewLineinternal static class ExpressionTransformer<TFrom, TTo> where TTo : TFromDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class Visitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private ParameterExpression _parameter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Visitor(ParameterExpression parameter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _parameter = parameter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _parameter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<TTo, bool>> Tranform(Expression<Func<TFrom, bool>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TTo));Di2015NewLine        Expression body = new Visitor(parameter).Visit(expression.Body);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TTo, bool>>(body, parameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17033402Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate int FindRange(int[] myArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int range = 5;Di2015NewLine    int start = 0;Di2015NewLine    int maxMatchFound = 0;Di2015NewLine    int maxIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < myArray.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (myArray[i] > myArray[start] + range)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int matchLength = i - start;Di2015NewLine            if (matchLength > maxMatchFound)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                maxMatchFound = matchLength;Di2015NewLine                maxIndex = start;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // move forward until within rangeDi2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ++start;Di2015NewLine            } while (myArray[i] > myArray[start] + range);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Final check, from myArray[start] to end of arrayDi2015NewLine    int len = myArray.Length - start;Di2015NewLine    if (len > maxMatchFound)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        maxMatchFound = len;Di2015NewLine        maxIndex = start;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return maxIndex;Di2015NewLine

17038267Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LockedCollectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private class CollectionImpl : ICollection<int>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       //Collection methodsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private sealed class CollectionWrapper : ICollection<int>, IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       public CollectionWrapper(CollectionImpl inner)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           _inner = inner;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       private CollectionImpl _innerDi2015NewLine       //Collection methods all just wrapping calls to innerDi2015NewLine       public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          _inner = null;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private CollectionImpl _instance - new CollectionImpl();Di2015NewLine    private object _lock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DoStuff(Action<ICollection<int>> task)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(_lock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using(var wrapper = new CollectionWrapper(_instance))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                task(wrapper);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17041295Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<List<string>> ReadOpenCalls(int relation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IQAssemblyResolver.Initialize(@"C:\\Program Files\\.....");Di2015NewLine        IQSDK IQSDK = new IQSDK();Di2015NewLine        string loginTekst = IQSDK.Login("Administrator", "..", "..").GetResult();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SDKRecordset inboundSet = IQSDK.CreateRecordset("R_ACTIONSCOPE", "CODE, DESCRIPTION, DATECREATED", "FK_RELATION = " + relation, "");Di2015NewLine        var messages = new List<List<string>>();Di2015NewLine        if (inboundSet != null && inboundSet.RecordCount > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            inboundSet.MoveFirst();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             doDi2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                string code = inboundSet.Fields["CODE"].Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine                string desc = inboundSet.Fields["DESCRIPTION"].Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine                string date = inboundSet.Fields["DATECREATED"].Value.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                messages.Add(new List<string> { code, desc, date});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                inboundSet.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine         while (!inboundSet.EOF);Di2015NewLine            return messages;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        messages.Add("Error niet gelukt");Di2015NewLine        return messages;// null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void StartReceive()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _timer.Interval = ReceiveTimeout * 1000;Di2015NewLine            _timer.Elapsed += _timer_Elapsed;Di2015NewLine            _timer.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void ResetReceiveTimer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _timer.Stop();Di2015NewLine            _timer.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void _timer_Elapsed(object sender, System.Timers.ElapsedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DebugData.AppendLine(string.Format("[SOCKET RECEIVE TIMEOUT OCCURRED] - Ip: {0} Has not Sent any data for {1} seconds, and didn't disconnect on it's own. Seconds Connected: {5}"Di2015NewLine                           , IpAddress, TimeSocketConnected, TimeSocketDisconnected, TimeLastDataPacketWasReceived, ByteCountReceived, TotalSecondsConnected));Di2015NewLine                        workSocket.Disconnect(false);Di2015NewLine                        workSocket.Shutdown(SocketShutdown.Both);Di2015NewLine                        workSocket.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //socket isn't connected, stop the timerDi2015NewLine                    _timer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //removed for reading purposes, just logged message to event logDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine 17050231Di2015UniqueSeparator private Storyboard GenerateMoveAnimation(double x, double y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var xAnimation = new DoubleAnimationDi2015NewLine                                 {Di2015NewLine                                     From = TranslateTransform.X,Di2015NewLine                                     To = xDi2015NewLine                                 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var yAnimation = new DoubleAnimationDi2015NewLine                                 {Di2015NewLine                                     From = TranslateTransform.Y,Di2015NewLine                                     To = yDi2015NewLine                                 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTarget(xAnimation, TranslateTransform);Di2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(xAnimation, new PropertyPath("X"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTarget(yAnimation, TranslateTransform);Di2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(yAnimation, new PropertyPath("Y"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var str = new Storyboard();Di2015NewLine            str.Children.Add(xAnimation);Di2015NewLine            str.Children.Add(yAnimation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return str;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void GestureListnerDragDelta(object sender, DragDeltaGestureEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var point = e.GetPosition(LayoutRoot);Di2015NewLine            GenerateMoveAnimation(point.X, point.Y).Begin();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void SurfaceGestureListner_OnTap(object sender, Microsoft.Phone.Controls.GestureEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var point = e.GetPosition(LayoutRoot);Di2015NewLine            GenerateMoveAnimation(point.X, point.Y).Begin();            Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

17050464Di2015UniqueSeparatorBatch
17050464Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Batch<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int batchSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> buffer = new List<T>(batchSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (T item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        buffer.Add(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (buffer.Count >= batchSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return buffer;Di2015NewLine            buffer = new List<T>(batchSize);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (buffer.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return buffer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17050927Di2015UniqueSeparator        int charactersPerRow = 14;Di2015NewLine        string chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ-=~!@#$%^&*()_+,./;'[]\\\\<>?:\\"{}|";Di2015NewLine        int rows = (int)Math.Ceiling((decimal)chars.Length / (decimal)charactersPerRow);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringFormat sf = new StringFormat();Di2015NewLine        sf.Alignment = StringAlignment.Center;Di2015NewLine        sf.LineAlignment = StringAlignment.Center;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (String FontName in DataHandler.GetFonts())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (FontStyle Style in Enum.GetValues(typeof(FontStyle)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Bitmap map = new Bitmap(585, 559);Di2015NewLine                    using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(map))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // each char must fit into this size:Di2015NewLine                        SizeF szF = new SizeF(map.Width / charactersPerRow, map.Height / rows);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // fallback font and sizeDi2015NewLine                        int fntSize = 8;Di2015NewLine                        Font fnt = new Font(FontName, fntSize, Style);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // figure out the largest font size that will fit into "szF" above:Di2015NewLine                        bool smaller = true;Di2015NewLine                        while (smaller)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Font newFnt = new Font(FontName, fntSize, Style);Di2015NewLine                            for (int i = 0; i < chars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                SizeF charSzF = g.MeasureString(chars[i].ToString(), newFnt);Di2015NewLine                                if (charSzF.Width > szF.Width || charSzF.Height > szF.Height)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    smaller = false;Di2015NewLine                                    break;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            if (smaller)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (fnt != null)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    fnt.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                fnt = newFnt;Di2015NewLine                                fntSize++;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // draw each char at the appropriate location:Di2015NewLine                        using (SolidBrush brsh = new SolidBrush(myColor))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            for (int i = 0; i < chars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                PointF ptF = new PointF(Di2015NewLine                                    (float)(i % charactersPerRow) / (float)charactersPerRow * map.Width,Di2015NewLine                                    ((float)((int)(i / charactersPerRow)) / (float)rows) * map.Height);Di2015NewLine                                g.DrawString(chars[i].ToString(), fnt, brsh, new RectangleF(ptF, szF), sf);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        map.Save(OutputPath + "\\\\" + Style.ToString() + "_" + FontName + ".png");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

17051277Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ConcatConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<IEnumerable> enumerables = new List<IEnumerable>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (object obj in values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable temp = obj as IEnumerable;Di2015NewLine            if (temp == null) throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine            enumerables.Add(temp);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        List<dynamic> enDynamic = new List<dynamic>();Di2015NewLine        enDynamic.AddRange(enumerables);Di2015NewLine        return Concat((dynamic)enDynamic);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<T> Concat<T>(params IEnumerable<T>[] toConcat)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return toConcat.Aggregate((a, b) => a.Concat(b));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerable Concat(params IEnumerable[] toConcat)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ArrayList temp = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLine        foreach (IEnumerable x in toConcat)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (object n in x)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                temp.Add(n);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return temp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17053913Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DieDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Using a constructor makes it obvious that you expect thisDi2015NewLine    // class to be initialized with both minimum and maximum values.Di2015NewLine    public Die(int minNum, int maxNum)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // You may want to add error-checking here, to throw an exceptionDi2015NewLine        // in the event that minNum and maxNum values are incorrect.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initialize the values.Di2015NewLine        MinNum = minNum;Di2015NewLine        MaxNum = maxNum;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Dice never start out with "no" value, right?Di2015NewLine        Roll();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // These will presumably only be set by the constructor, but people canDi2015NewLine    // check to see what the min and max are at any time.Di2015NewLine    public int MinNum { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int MaxNum { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Keeps track of the most recent roll value.Di2015NewLine    private int _lastRoll;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Creates a new _lastRoll value, and returns it.Di2015NewLine    public int Roll() { Di2015NewLine        _lastRoll = diceRoll.Next(MinNum, MaxNum);Di2015NewLine        return _lastRoll;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Returns the result of the last roll, without rolling again.Di2015NewLine    public int LastRoll {get {return _lastRoll;}}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This Random object will be reused by all instances, which helpsDi2015NewLine    // make results of multiple dice somewhat less random.Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Random diceRoll = new Random();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17055094Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string [] CommonString(string left, string right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        string [] rightArray = right.Split();Di2015NewLine        string [] leftArray = left.Split();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        result.AddRange(rightArray.Where(r => leftArray.Any(l => l.StartsWith(r))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // must check other way in case left array contains smaller words than right arrayDi2015NewLine        result.AddRange(leftArray.Where(l => rightArray.Any(r => r.StartsWith(l))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result.Distinct().ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty IsTextMatchProperty =Di2015NewLine            DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("IsTextMatch", value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            obj.SetValue(IsAnyTextMatchProperty, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class SearchValueConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string cellText = values[0] == null ? String.Empty : values[0].ToString();Di2015NewLine            string searchText = values[1] as String;Di2015NewLine            var datagrid = values[2] as DataGrid;Di2015NewLine            bool returnvalue = false;Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(searchText) &&Di2015NewLine                !string.IsNullOrEmpty(cellText))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                returnvalue = cellText.ToLower().StartsWith(searchText.ToLower());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // we found a match so mark DataGrid tag to true for use on TextBoxDi2015NewLine            if (returnvalue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                datagrid.SetValue(DataGridTextSearch.IsAnyTextMatchProperty, true);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return returnvalue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new System.NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17058011Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<LocalDate> GetSundayToWednesday(int year, int month, int week)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    LocalDate date = new LocalDate(year, month, 1).PlusDays(-1);        Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < week; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        date = date.Next(IsoDayOfWeek.Sunday);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // You always want 4 days, Sunday to WednesdayDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return date;Di2015NewLine        date = date.PlusDays(1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17058011Di2015UniqueSeparatorDateTime

17058234Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROCEDURE yourInsertOperation Di2015NewLine    -- Add the parameters for the stored procedure hereDi2015NewLine    @Param1 INT, Di2015NewLine    @Param2 VARCHAR(20),Di2015NewLine    --......your parameter list goes hereDi2015NewLine    -- here you would pass the records for your document tableDi2015NewLine    @YourTableValuedParam dbo.yourDocumentTableType READONLY Di2015NewLineASDi2015NewLine    BEGINDi2015NewLine        -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets fromDi2015NewLine        -- interfering with SELECT statements.Di2015NewLine        SET NOCOUNT ON;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        -- declare temp table type & assign the TVP to itDi2015NewLine        DECLARE @TempDocuments dbo.yourDocumentTableTypeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        INSERT INTO @TempDocuments (docName, docSize)Di2015NewLine        SELECT docName, docSize FROM @YourTableValuedParamDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DECLARE @ResourceID BIGINT            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        --Marking the start of a transactionDi2015NewLine        BEGIN TRANSACTIONDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        --Inserting records into resource tableDi2015NewLine        INSERT INTO resourceTable(column1, column2) VALUES (@param1, @param2)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        --selecting resourceID to be inserted into document table & resource-document tableDi2015NewLine        SELECT @ResourceID = SCOPE_IDENTITY()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WHILE EXISTS(SELECT * FROM @TempDocuments)Di2015NewLine            BEGIN                        Di2015NewLine                DECLARE @DocumentID BIGINTDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                --Inserting records into document table from the table valued parameterDi2015NewLine                INSERT INTO documentTable(docName, docSize, resourceID)Di2015NewLine                SELECT TOP 1 docName, docSize, @ResourceID FROM @TempDocumentsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SELECT @DocumentID = SCOPE_IDENTITY()Di2015NewLine                INSERT INTO resouceDocumentTable(resourceID, docID) VALUES (@ResourceID, @DocumentID)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                DELETE TOP (1) FROM @TempDocumentsDi2015NewLine            ENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    --Checking for any error in the whole transaction (all 3 table insert operation)Di2015NewLine    IF @@ERROR > 0Di2015NewLine        --rollback if there was any errorDi2015NewLine        ROLLBACK TRANSACTIONDi2015NewLine    ELSEDi2015NewLine        --commit whole transaction (all 3 table insert operation)Di2015NewLine        COMMIT TRANSACTIONDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine

17065653Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar data = @"<table>Di2015NewLine  <tbody>Di2015NewLine    <tr>Di2015NewLine       <td>Header1</td>Di2015NewLine       <td>Header2</td>Di2015NewLine       <td>Header3</td>Di2015NewLine       <td>Header4</td>Di2015NewLine    </tr>Di2015NewLine    <tr>Di2015NewLine       <td>1</td>Di2015NewLine       <td>2</td>Di2015NewLine       <td>3</td>Di2015NewLine       <td>4</td>Di2015NewLine    </tr>Di2015NewLine    <tr>Di2015NewLine       <td>11</td>Di2015NewLine       <td>22</td>Di2015NewLine       <td>33</td>Di2015NewLine       <td>44</td>Di2015NewLine    </tr>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  </tbody>Di2015NewLine</table>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar xDoc = XDocument.Parse(data);Di2015NewLinevar headerElements = xDoc.XPathSelectElements("//table//tbody//tr");Di2015NewLineint headerCount = headerElements.First().Descendants().Count();Di2015NewLinevar nodes = headerElements.SelectMany(x => x.Descendants())Di2015NewLine                          .Select(x => x.Value)Di2015NewLine                          .ToList();Di2015NewLinevar head = nodes.Take(headerCount).ToList();Di2015NewLinevar body = nodes.Skip(headerCount).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar pairs = new List<Tuple<string,string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor(var i = 0; i < body.Count; i += headerCount)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for(int j = 0; j < head.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pairs.Add(Tuple.Create(head[j], body[i+j]));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(var pair in pairs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{0} = {1}", pair.Item1, pair.Item2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17065678Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T DeepClone<T>(T original)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!typeof(T).IsSerializable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("The type must be serializable.", "original");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (ReferenceEquals(original, null))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var stream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var formatter = new BinaryFormatterDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Context = new StreamingContext(StreamingContextStates.Clone)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        formatter.Serialize(stream, original);Di2015NewLine        stream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (T) formatter.Deserialize(stream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17067768Di2015UniqueSeparatorint[,] graph =Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                {1, 2}, {1, 3}, {1, 4}, {2, 3},Di2015NewLine                {3, 4}, {2, 6}, {4, 6}, {7, 8},Di2015NewLine                {8, 9}, {9, 7}, {2, 3}, {1, 5}, {2, 4}, {4, 6},Di2015NewLine                {7, 4}, {3, 5}, {4, 5}, {2, 8},Di2015NewLine                {8, 1}, {9, 1}, {14,1}, {2,14}, {5, 1}, {7, 3}, {6, 2}, {10,1},Di2015NewLine                {10, 4}, {10, 6}, {10, 3}, {10,2},Di2015NewLine                {8, 3}, {1, 7}Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLinevar g = graph.Cast<int>().ToArray();Di2015NewLinevar edges = Enumerable.Range(0, g.Length / 2) Di2015NewLine      .Select(i => Tuple.Create(g[i * 2], g[i * 2 + 1]));Di2015NewLinevar edgeLookup = edges.ToLookup(x => x.Item1);Di2015NewLinevar stack = new Stack<Tuple<int, int>>(edgeLookup.First());Di2015NewLinevar visited = new HashSet<Tuple<int, int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile(stack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var current = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine    if(!visited.Add(current)) throw new Exception("cycle!!!");Di2015NewLine    var newNodes = edgeLookup[current.Item2];Di2015NewLine    foreach(var newNode in newNodes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(newNode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17069659Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetSource
17069659Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string GetSource()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string source = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetData("Source") as string;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(source))Di2015NewLine            return source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var assembly = Assembly.GetEntryAssembly();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // GetEntryAssembly() can return null when called in the context of a unit test project.Di2015NewLine        // That can also happen when called from an app hosted in IIS, or even a windows service.Di2015NewLine        if (assembly == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // From http://stackoverflow.com/a/14165787/279516:Di2015NewLine            assembly = new StackTrace().GetFrames().Last().GetMethod().Module.Assembly;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return assembly.GetName().Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return "Unknown";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17069659Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication13Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AppDomain appDomain = AppDomain.CreateDomain("foo");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IFoo foo = (IFoo)appDomain.CreateInstanceFromAndUnwrap(Assembly.GetEntryAssembly().Location, typeof(Foo).FullName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foo.SetSource("Foo Host");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foo.DoSomething();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public interface IFooDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        void DoSomething();Di2015NewLine        void SetSource(string source);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Foo : MarshalByRefObject, IFooDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void DoSomething()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string source = Foo.Source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(source))Di2015NewLine                source = "some default";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(source);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string Source{get; private set;}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void SetSource(string source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Foo.Source = source;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17076478Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<Post> Search(string criteria, int x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Split all the search keys by space, so if you have "Search Word", you will getDi2015NewLine        // the occurances of [Search] and also [Word]Di2015NewLine        List<string> searchKeys = criteria.Split(' ').ToList<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Filter activeDi2015NewLine        _db = _db.Where(p => p.IsActive);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Go through each keyDi2015NewLine        foreach (string str in searchKeys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _db = _db.Where(p => p.Location.Contains(str)Di2015NewLine                    || p.PostText.Contains(str)Di2015NewLine                    || p.Weather.Contains(str));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return number wanted - and items will only be extracted here on the ToList()Di2015NewLine        return _db.OrderByDescending(p => p.PostDate).Take(x).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17083118Di2015UniqueSeparator    public RadioButton FindChild<T>(DependencyObject parent)       Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Confirm parent and childName are valid.Di2015NewLine        if (parent == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RadioButton foundChild = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int childrenCount = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(parent);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < childrenCount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(parent, i);Di2015NewLine            // If the child is not of the request child type childDi2015NewLine            var childType = child as radioButton;Di2015NewLine            if (childType == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // recursively drill down the treeDi2015NewLine                foundChild = FindChild(child);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If the child is found, break so we do not overwrite the found child.Di2015NewLine                if (foundChild != null) return foundChild ;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (childName.IsChecked == true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               return foundChild;  Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
