17083624Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // check our math first!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // You can see 2345 is converted to 0 by using multiplication of digits in 2 stepsDi2015NewLine        int value, steps;Di2015NewLine        value = MultiplyToOneDigit(2345, out steps);Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(value == 0);Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(steps == 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // and it is converted to 5 by using addition of digits in 2 stepsDi2015NewLine        value = SumToOneDigit(2345, out steps);Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(value == 5);Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(steps == 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // this bit is any random numberDi2015NewLine        var rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int N = rand.Next(0, MAX);Di2015NewLine            int result = Execute(N);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("For N={0}, our answer is {1}", N, result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    const int MAX = 1000000000;Di2015NewLine    //Now consider any number N.Di2015NewLine    static int Execute(int N)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Let us say that it can be converted by multiplying digits to a one digit number d1 in n1Di2015NewLine        // steps and by adding digits to one digit number d2 in n2 steps.Di2015NewLine        int n1, n2;Di2015NewLine        int d1 = MultiplyToOneDigit(N, out n1),Di2015NewLine            d2 = SumToOneDigit(N, out n2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Your task is to find smallest number greater than N and less than 1000000000 Di2015NewLine        for (int i = N + 1; i < MAX; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int value, steps;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // which can be converted by multiplying its digits to d1 in less than or equal to n1 stepsDi2015NewLine            value = MultiplyToOneDigit(i, out steps);Di2015NewLine            if (value != d1 || steps > n1) continue; // no goodDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // and by adding its digits to d2 in less than or equal to n2 steps.Di2015NewLine            value = SumToOneDigit(i, out steps);Di2015NewLine            if(value != d2 || steps > n2) continue; // no goodDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return -1; // no answerDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static int MultiplyToOneDigit(int value, out int steps)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        steps = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (value > 10)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = MultiplyDigits(value);Di2015NewLine            steps++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static int SumToOneDigit(int value, out int steps)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        steps = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (value > 10)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = SumDigits(value);Di2015NewLine            steps++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static int MultiplyDigits(int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int acc = 1;Di2015NewLine        while (value > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            acc *= value % 10;Di2015NewLine            value /= 10;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return acc;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static int SumDigits(int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int total = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (value > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += value % 10;Di2015NewLine            value /= 10;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return total;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17084171Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Batch<T>(Di2015NewLine     this IEnumerable<T> source, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T[] bucket = null;Di2015NewLine    var count = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bucket == null)            Di2015NewLine            bucket = new T[size];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bucket[count++] = item;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (count != size)            Di2015NewLine            continue;            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return bucket;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bucket = null;Di2015NewLine        count = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (bucket != null && count > 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return bucket.Take(count);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17086723Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Convert the HTML code from the specified URL to a PDF documentDi2015NewLine    and send the document to the browserDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate void ConvertURLToPDF()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string urlToConvert = textBoxWebPageURL.Text.Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create the PDF converter. Optionally the HTML viewer width canDi2015NewLine        be specified as parameterDi2015NewLine    // The default HTML viewer width is 1024 pixels.Di2015NewLine    PdfConverter pdfConverter = new PdfConverter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set the license key - requiredDi2015NewLine    pdfConverter.LicenseKey = "R8nYyNnI2MjRxtjI29nG2drG0dHR0Q==";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set the converter options - optionalDi2015NewLine    pdfConverter.PdfDocumentOptions.PdfPageSize = PdfPageSize.A4;Di2015NewLine    pdfConverter.PdfDocumentOptions.PdfCompressionLevel = PdfCompressionLevel.Normal;Di2015NewLine    pdfConverter.PdfDocumentOptions.PdfPageOrientation = PdfPageOrientation.Portrait;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set if header and footer are shown in the PDF - optional - defaultDi2015NewLine        is false Di2015NewLine    pdfConverter.PdfDocumentOptions.ShowHeader = cbAddHeader.Checked;Di2015NewLine    pdfConverter.PdfDocumentOptions.ShowFooter = cbAddFooter.Checked;Di2015NewLine    // set if the HTML content is resized if necessary to fit the PDFDi2015NewLine        page width - default is trueDi2015NewLine    pdfConverter.PdfDocumentOptions.FitWidth = cbFitWidth.Checked;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set the embedded fonts option - optional - default is falseDi2015NewLine response, otherwise the ASP.NETDi2015NewLine    // web page will render its content to PDF document streamDi2015NewLine    response.End();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17087292Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass EtxReader : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<string> ReadAll()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string s;Di2015NewLine        while ((s = ReadNext()) != null) yield return s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (socket != null) socket.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        socket = null;Di2015NewLine        if (backlog != null) backlog.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        backlog = null;Di2015NewLine        buffer = null;Di2015NewLine        encoding = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public EtxReader(Socket socket, Encoding encoding = null, int bufferSize = 4096)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.socket = socket;Di2015NewLine        this.encoding = encoding ?? Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLine        this.buffer = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private Encoding encoding;Di2015NewLine    private Socket socket;Di2015NewLine    int index, count;Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer;Di2015NewLine    private bool ReadMore()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        index = count = 0;Di2015NewLine        int bytes = socket.Receive(buffer);Di2015NewLine        if (bytes > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            count = bytes;Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public const byte ETX = 3;Di2015NewLine    private MemoryStream backlog = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    public string ReadNext()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string s;Di2015NewLine        if (count == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!ReadMore()) return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // at this point, we expect there to be *some* data;Di2015NewLine        // this may or may not include the ETX terminatorDi2015NewLine        var etxIndex = Array.IndexOf(buffer, ETX, index);Di2015NewLine        if (etxIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // found another message in the existing bufferDi2015NewLine            int len = etxIndex - index;Di2015NewLine            s = encoding.GetString(buffer, index, len);Di2015NewLine            index = etxIndex + 1;Di2015NewLine            count -= (len + 1);Di2015NewLine            return s;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // no ETX in the buffer, so we'll need to fetch more data;Di2015NewLine        // buffer the unconsumed data that we haveDi2015NewLine        backlog.SetLength(0);Di2015NewLine        backlog.Write(buffer, index, count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool haveEtx;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!ReadMore())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // we had unused data; this must signal an errorDi2015NewLine                throw new EndOfStreamException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            etxIndex = Array.IndexOf(buffer, ETX, index);Di2015NewLine            haveEtx = etxIndex >= 0;Di2015NewLine            if (!haveEtx)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // keep bufferingDi2015NewLine                backlog.Write(buffer, index, count);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        } while (!haveEtx);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // now we have some data in the backlog, and the ETX in the buffer;Di2015NewLine        // for convenience, copy the rest of the next message intoDi2015NewLine        // the backlogDi2015NewLine        backlog.Write(buffer, 0, etxIndex);Di2015NewLine        s = encoding.GetString(backlog.GetBuffer(), 0, (int)backlog.Length);Di2015NewLine        index = etxIndex + 1;Di2015NewLine        count -= (etxIndex + 1);Di2015NewLine        return s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17090254Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class MyExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TResult> AggregatingSelect<TItem, TAggregate, TResult>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<TItem> items,Di2015NewLine        Func<TItem, TAggregate, TAggregate> aggregator,Di2015NewLine        TAggregate initial,Di2015NewLine        Func<TItem, TAggregate, TResult> projection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TAggregate aggregate = initial;Di2015NewLine        foreach (TItem item in items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            aggregate = aggregator(item, aggregate);Di2015NewLine            yield return projection(item, aggregate);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var numbers = new[] { 3, 1, 4, 9 };Di2015NewLine        var result = numbers.AggregatingSelect(Di2015NewLine            (int item, int agg) => item + agg, Di2015NewLine            0, Di2015NewLine            (int item, int agg) => agg);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(string.Join(",", result));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17090440Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing UnityEngine;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Jumper : MonoBehaviourDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine#region Set in editor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic float jumpDuration = 0.5f;Di2015NewLinepublic float jumpDistance = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#endregion Set in editor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool jumping = false;Di2015NewLineprivate float jumpStartVelocityY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Start()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // For a given distance and jump durationDi2015NewLine    // there is only one possible movement curve.Di2015NewLine    // We are executing Y axis movement separately,Di2015NewLine    // so we need to know a starting velocity.Di2015NewLine    jumpStartVelocityY = -jumpDuration * Physics.gravity.y / 2;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Update()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (jumping)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (Input.GetKeyDown(KeyCode.LeftArrow))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Warning: this will actually move jumpDistance forwardDi2015NewLine        // and jumpDistance to the side.Di2015NewLine        // If you want to move jumpDistance diagonally, use:Di2015NewLine        // Vector3 forwardAndLeft = (transform.forward - transform.right).normalized * jumpDistance;Di2015NewLine        Vector3 forwardAndLeft = (transform.forward - transform.right) * jumpDistance;Di2015NewLine        StartCoroutine(Jump(forwardAndLeft));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (Input.GetKeyDown(KeyCode.RightArrow))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vector3 forwardAndRight = (transform.forward + transform.right) * jumpDistance;Di2015NewLine        StartCoroutine(Jump(forwardAndRight));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate IEnumerator Jump(Vector3 direction)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    jumping = true;Di2015NewLine    Vector3 startPoint = transform.position;Di2015NewLine    Vector3 targetPoint = startPoint + direction;Di2015NewLine    float time = 0;Di2015NewLine    float jumpProgress = 0;Di2015NewLine    float velocityY = jumpStartVelocityY;Di2015NewLine    float height = startPoint.y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (jumping)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        jumpProgress = time / jumpDuration;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (jumpProgress > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            jumping = false;Di2015NewLine            jumpProgress = 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Vector3 currentPos = Vector3.Lerp(startPoint, targetPoint, jumpProgress);Di2015NewLine        currentPos.y = height;Di2015NewLine        transform.position = currentPos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Wait until next frame.Di2015NewLine        yield return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        height += velocityY * Time.deltaTime;Di2015NewLine        velocityY += Time.deltaTime * Physics.gravity.y;Di2015NewLine        time += Time.deltaTime;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    transform.position = targetPoint;Di2015NewLine    yield break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17091178Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DataRetrieverLog : IDataPageRetrieverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string tableName;Di2015NewLine    private string sortColumn;Di2015NewLine    private SqlCommand command;Di2015NewLine    private DataTable table;Di2015NewLine    private SqlDataAdapter adapter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataRetrieverLog(string connectionString, string tableName, string sortColumn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SqlConnection connection = new SqlConnection(connectionString);Di2015NewLine        connection.Open();Di2015NewLine        command = connection.CreateCommand();Di2015NewLine        this.tableName = tableName;Di2015NewLine        this.sortColumn = sortColumn;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int rowCountValue = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int RowCountDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Return the existing value if it has already been determined. Di2015NewLine            if (rowCountValue != -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return rowCountValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Retrieve the row count from the database.Di2015NewLine            command.CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM " + tableName;Di2015NewLine            rowCountValue = (int)command.ExecuteScalar();Di2015NewLine            return rowCountValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private DataColumnCollection columnsValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataColumnCollection ColumnsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Return the existing value if it has already been determined. Di2015NewLine            if (columnsValue != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return columnsValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Retrieve the column information from the database.Di2015NewLine            command.CommandText = "SELECT * FROM " + tableName;Di2015NewLine            SqlDataAdapter adapter = new SqlDataAdapter();Di2015NewLine            adapter.SelectCommand = command;Di2015NewLine            DataTable table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine            table.Locale = System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture;Di2015NewLine            adapter.FillSchema(table, SchemaType.Source);Di2015NewLine            columnsValue = table.Columns;Di2015NewLine            return columnsValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string commaSeparatedListOfColumnNamesValue = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string CommaSeparatedListOfColumnNamesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Return the existing value if it has already been determined. Di2015NewLine            if (commaSeparatedListOfColumnNamesValue != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return commaSeparatedListOfColumnNamesValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Store a list of column names for use in the Di2015NewLine            // SupplyPageOfData method.Di2015NewLine            System.Text.StringBuilder commaSeparatedColumnNames =Di2015NewLine                new System.Text.StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            bool firstColumn = true;Di2015NewLine            foreach (DataColumn column in Columns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!firstColumn)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    commaSeparatedColumnNames.Append("], [");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    commaSeparatedColumnNames.Append("[");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                commaSeparatedColumnNames.Append(column.ColumnName);Di2015NewLine                firstColumn = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            commaSeparatedColumnNames.Append("]");Di2015NewLine            commaSeparatedListOfColumnNamesValue =Di2015NewLine                commaSeparatedColumnNames.ToString();Di2015NewLine            return commaSeparatedListOfColumnNamesValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Declare variables to be reused by the SupplyPageOfData method. Di2015NewLine    private string columnToSortBy;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataTable SupplyPageOfData(int lowerPageBoundary, int rowsPerPage)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Store the name of the ID column. This column must contain unique  Di2015NewLine        // values so the SQL below will work properly. Di2015NewLine        if (columnToSortBy == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            columnToSortBy = this.Columns[0].ColumnName;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!this.Columns[columnToSortBy].Unique)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(String.Format(Di2015NewLine                "Column {0} must contain unique values.", columnToSortBy));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Retrieve the specified number of rows from the database, starting Di2015NewLine        // with the row specified by the lowerPageBoundary parameter.Di2015NewLine        String text = "Select Top " + rowsPerPage + " " +Di2015NewLine            CommaSeparatedListOfColumnNames + " From " + tableName +Di2015NewLine            " WHERE " + columnToSortBy + " NOT IN (SELECT TOP " +Di2015NewLine            lowerPageBoundary + " " + columnToSortBy + " From " +Di2015NewLine            tableName + " Order By " + sortColumn +Di2015NewLine            ") Order By " + sortColumn;Di2015NewLine        command.CommandText = text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        adapter = new SqlDataAdapter(text, GUI.dictSettings["connectionString"]);Di2015NewLine        SqlCommandBuilder commandBuilder = new SqlCommandBuilder(adapter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        table.Locale = System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture;Di2015NewLine        adapter.Fill(table);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return table;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataTable getDataTable()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return table;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SqlDataAdapter getAdapter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return adapter;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17091916Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Encrypt(string data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var des = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider { Mode = CipherMode.ECB, Key = GetKey("a1!B78s!5(j$S1c%"), Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7 })Di2015NewLine    using (var desEncrypt = des.CreateEncryptor())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buffer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Convert.ToBase64String(desEncrypt.TransformFinalBlock(buffer, 0, buffer.Length));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string Decrypt(string data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var des = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider { Mode = CipherMode.ECB, Key = GetKey("a1!B78s!5(j$S1c%"), Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7 })Di2015NewLine    using (var desEncrypt = des.CreateDecryptor())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buffer = Convert.FromBase64String(data.Replace(" ", "+"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(desEncrypt.TransformFinalBlock(buffer, 0, buffer.Length));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17092315Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ConvertToFriendlyUrl(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var decomposed = text.Normalize(NormalizationForm.FormKD);Di2015NewLine    var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var ch in decomposed)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var charInfo = CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory(ch);Di2015NewLine        switch (charInfo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Keep these as they areDi2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.DecimalDigitNumber:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.LetterNumber:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.LowercaseLetter:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.CurrencySymbol:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.OtherLetter:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.OtherNumber:Di2015NewLine                builder.Append(ch);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Convert these to dashesDi2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.DashPunctuation:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.MathSymbol:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.ModifierSymbol:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.OtherPunctuation:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.OtherSymbol:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.SpaceSeparator:Di2015NewLine                builder.Append('-');Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Convert to lower-caseDi2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.TitlecaseLetter:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.UppercaseLetter:Di2015NewLine                builder.Append(char.ToLowerInvariant(ch));Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Ignore certain types of charactersDi2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.OpenPunctuation:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.ClosePunctuation:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.ConnectorPunctuation:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.Control:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.EnclosingMark:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.FinalQuotePunctuation:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.Format:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.InitialQuotePunctuation:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.LineSeparator:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.ModifierLetter:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.NonSpacingMark:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.OtherNotAssigned:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.ParagraphSeparator:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.PrivateUse:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.SpacingCombiningMark:Di2015NewLine            case UnicodeCategory.Surrogate:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var built = builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    while (built.Contains("--")) Di2015NewLine        built = built.Replace("--", "-");Di2015NewLine    while (built.EndsWith("-"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        built = built.Substring(0, built.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (built.StartsWith("-"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        built = built.Substring(1, built.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return built;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string GetIncrementedUrl(string url)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parts = url.Split('-');Di2015NewLine    var lastPortion = parts.LastOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    int numToInc;Di2015NewLine    bool incExisting;Di2015NewLine    if (lastPortion == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        numToInc = 1;Di2015NewLine        incExisting = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (int.TryParse(lastPortion, out numToInc))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            incExisting = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            incExisting = false;Di2015NewLine            numToInc = 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var fragToKeep = incExisting Di2015NewLine        ? string.Join("-", parts.Take(parts.Length - 1).ToArray()) Di2015NewLine        : url;Di2015NewLine    return fragToKeep + "-" + (numToInc + 1).ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string SeekUrl(Di2015NewLine    string name, Func<string, bool> uniquenessCheck)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var urlName = UrlUtils.ConvertToFriendlyUrl(name);Di2015NewLine    while (!uniquenessCheck(urlName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        urlName = UrlUtils.GetIncrementedUrl(urlName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return urlName;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17095803Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface Stat //common interface which can be for tourneys, matches etc tooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int Goals { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    int Assists { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    int Passes { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//You might want to break this interface further to fit in other specific statsDi2015NewLine//like player stat, match stat etc.Di2015NewLine//Also making it an interface rather than base class is better, you shouldnt have Di2015NewLine//2 different entities like PlayerStat and MatchStat share a common base classDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PlayerStat : Stat //can be career stat, single match stat etc;Di2015NewLine{                              //depends on context where you call itDi2015NewLine    public int Goals { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Assists { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Passes { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//another exampleDi2015NewLinepublic class MatchStat : Stat Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Goals { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Assists { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Passes { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Viewership { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TeamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // all what makes a good unitDi2015NewLine}    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MatchDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Team Team1 { get; set; } Di2015NewLine    public Team Team2 { get; set; } Di2015NewLine    public double TimeElapsed { get; set; }   Di2015NewLine    public string RefereeName { get; set; } Di2015NewLine    public MatchStat Stat { get; set; } //a match has match statDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//provide a suitable constructor that takes a player and a matchDi2015NewLinepublic class PlayerMatchStatDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Player Player { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Match Match { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public PlayerStat Stat { get; set; } //should return player's stat for this matchDi2015NewLine    public bool IsCaptain { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int DistanceCompleted { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//provide a suitable constructor that takes a player and a seasonDi2015NewLinepublic class PlayerSeasonStatDi2015NewLine{   Di2015NewLine    public bool Player { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Season Season { get; set; } //have a season classDi2015NewLine    public PlayerStat Stat { get; set; } //should return player's stat for this seasonDi2015NewLine    public int RedCards { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//and lastlyDi2015NewLineclass PlayerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Player()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //init workDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; } Di2015NewLine    public PlayerStat CareerStat { get; set; } //just like match has match statDi2015NewLine    public Team[] Teams { get; set; } //Team name shouldn't go within a player Di2015NewLine                                      //class, he could be in many teams.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //since player inherently has no match or season, we shall provide methods to query themDi2015NewLine    public PlayerMatchStat GetMatchStat(Match match)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new PlayerMatchStat(match, this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public PlayerSeasonStat GetSeasonStat(Season season)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new PlayerSeasonStat(season, this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17098396Di2015UniqueSeparator^(?>J(?>AN|U[NL]?+)?|F(?>EV?+)?|M(?>A[RI]?+)?|A(?>PR?+|UG?+)?|S(?>EP?+)?|O(?>CT?+)?|N(?>OV?+)?|D(?>EC?+)?)$Di2015NewLine
17098396Di2015UniqueSeparatorAU
17098396Di2015UniqueSeparator ^(?>             # an atomic group is at the begining of the patternDi2015NewLine                  # In this group there is an alternation J...|F...|M... Di2015NewLine                  # until the closing parenthesis of the atomic groupsDi2015NewLine )$               # at the end of the stringDi2015NewLine
17098396Di2015UniqueSeparator^   ^   # the re is on the begining of the string, all is fineDi2015NewLineA   J   # the re try with J and fails then goes to the next alternationDi2015NewLineA   F   # test F and fails ...Di2015NewLineA   M   # ...Di2015NewLineA   A   # test A and succeedsDi2015NewLineU   P   # test P and fails and goes to the next alternationDi2015NewLineU   U   # test U and succeedsDi2015NewLine$   G   # don't test anything the re know that it is the end of the string!Di2015NewLine

17098724Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Combine(string path1, string path2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (path1 == null || path2 == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException((path1 == null) ? "path1" : "path2");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Path.CheckInvalidPathChars(path1, false);Di2015NewLine    Path.CheckInvalidPathChars(path2, false);Di2015NewLine    return Path.CombineNoChecks(path1, path2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17098724Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string CombineNoChecks(string path1, string path2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (path2.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return path1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (path1.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return path2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (Path.IsPathRooted(path2))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return path2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    char c = path1[path1.Length - 1];Di2015NewLine    if (c != Path.DirectorySeparatorChar && c != Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar && c != Path.VolumeSeparatorChar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return path1 + Path.DirectorySeparatorChar + path2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return path1 + path2;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17098724Di2015UniqueSeparatorPath.DirectorySeparatorChar = "\\\\"Di2015NewLinePath.AltDirectorySeparatorChar = "/"Di2015NewLinePath.VolumeSeparatorChar = ":"Di2015NewLine

17099130Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Color HSVtoRGB(float hue, float saturation, float value, float alpha)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (hue > 1f) { hue -= 1f; }Di2015NewLine        while (hue < 0f) { hue += 1f; }Di2015NewLine        while (saturation > 1f) { saturation -= 1f; }Di2015NewLine        while (saturation < 0f) { saturation += 1f; }Di2015NewLine        while (value > 1f) { value -= 1f; }Di2015NewLine        while (value < 0f) { value += 1f; }Di2015NewLine        if (hue > 0.999f) { hue = 0.999f; }Di2015NewLine        if (hue < 0.001f) { hue = 0.001f; }Di2015NewLine        if (saturation > 0.999f) { saturation = 0.999f; }Di2015NewLine        if (saturation < 0.001f) { return new Color(value * 255f, value * 255f, value * 255f); }Di2015NewLine        if (value > 0.999f) { value = 0.999f; }Di2015NewLine        if (value < 0.001f) { value = 0.001f; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float h6 = hue * 6f;Di2015NewLine        if (h6 == 6f) { h6 = 0f; }Di2015NewLine        int ihue = (int)(h6);Di2015NewLine        float p = value * (1f - saturation);Di2015NewLine        float q = value * (1f - (saturation * (h6 - (float)ihue)));Di2015NewLine        float t = value * (1f - (saturation * (1f - (h6 - (float)ihue))));Di2015NewLine        switch (ihue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 0:Di2015NewLine                return new Color(value, t, p, alpha);Di2015NewLine            case 1:Di2015NewLine                return new Color(q, value, p, alpha);Di2015NewLine            case 2:Di2015NewLine                return new Color(p, value, t, alpha);Di2015NewLine            case 3:Di2015NewLine                return new Color(p, q, value, alpha);Di2015NewLine            case 4:Di2015NewLine                return new Color(t, p, value, alpha);Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                return new Color(value, p, q, alpha);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17103549Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass GeneratorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Width { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Height { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Radius { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<int> _numbers;Di2015NewLine    private bool[] _picked;Di2015NewLine    private int[] _grid;Di2015NewLine    private Random _rnd;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Generator(int width, int height, int radius)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Width = width;Di2015NewLine        Height = height;Di2015NewLine        Radius = radius;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine        _numbers = Enumerable.Range(0,Width*Height).OrderBy(_ => _rnd.Next()).ToList();Di2015NewLine        _picked = _numbers.Select(n => false).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        _grid = new int[width*height];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int[] Generate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Generate(0)Di2015NewLine            .Select(a => a.ToArray()) // copyDi2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<int[]> Generate(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (index >= Width * Height)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return _grid;Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int xmid = index%Width;Di2015NewLine        int xlow = Math.Max(0, xmid - Radius);Di2015NewLine        int xhigh = Math.Min(xmid + Radius, Width - 1);Di2015NewLine        int ymid = index/Width;Di2015NewLine        int ylow = Math.Max(0, ymid - Radius);Di2015NewLine        int yhigh = ymid;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var validNumbers = _numbersDi2015NewLine            .Where(n =>Di2015NewLine                !_picked[n] &&Di2015NewLine                Enumerable.Range(xlow, xhigh - xlow + 1).All(x =>Di2015NewLine                    Enumerable.Range(ylow, yhigh-ylow+1).All(y =>Di2015NewLine                        y*Width + x >= index // Not generated yetDi2015NewLine                        || Math.Abs(x - xmid) + Math.Abs(y - ymid) > Radius // Outside radiusDi2015NewLine                        || Math.Abs(_grid[y*Width+x] - n) > 1 // Out of rangeDi2015NewLine                    )Di2015NewLine                )Di2015NewLine            )Di2015NewLine            .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var n in validNumbers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _grid[index] = n;Di2015NewLine            _picked[n] = true;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var sol in Generate(index + 1))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return sol;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _picked[n] = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17104000Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] ReadFully(Stream input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[16 * 1024];Di2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int read;Di2015NewLine        while ((read = input.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ms.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17104998Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ArrayCollection {Di2015NewLine  List<int> startIndexes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine  List<int> lengths = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine  const int 1beeellion = 100;Di2015NewLine  PointF[] giganticList = new PointF[1beeellion];    Di2015NewLine  public ArraySegment<PointF> this[int childIndex] {Di2015NewLine    get {Di2015NewLine    // Care with this method, ArraySegment exposes the original array, which callers could thenDi2015NewLine    //  do bad things toDi2015NewLine    return new ArraySegment<String>(giganticList, startIndexes[childIndex], length[childIndex]);Di2015NewLine  }}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // returns the index of the child arrayDi2015NewLine  public int AddChild(int length) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // TODO: needs to take account of lists with no entries yetDi2015NewLine    int startIndex = startIndexes.Last() + lengths.Last(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // TODO: check that startIndex + length is not more than giganticIndexDi2015NewLine    //   If it is then Di2015NewLine    //     find the smallest unused block which is larger than the length requestedDi2015NewLine    //     or defrag our unused array sectionsDi2015NewLine    //   otherwise throw out of memoryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    startIndexes.Add(startIndex); // will need inserts for defrag operationsDi2015NewLine    lengths.Add(length); // will need inserts for defrag operationsDi2015NewLine    return startIndexes.Count - 1; // inserts will need to return inserted indexDi2015NewLine  }      Di2015NewLine  public ArraySegment<PointF> GetChildAsSegment(int childIndex) {Di2015NewLine    // Care with this method, ArraySegment exposes the original array, which callers could thenDi2015NewLine    //  do bad things toDi2015NewLine    return new ArraySegment<String>(giganticList, startIndexes[childIndex], length[childIndex]);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public void SetChildValue(int childIndex, int elementIndex, PointF value) {Di2015NewLine    // TODO: needs to take account of lists with no entries yet, or invalid childIndexDi2015NewLine    // TODO: check and PREVENT buffer overflow (see warning) here and in other methodsDi2015NewLine    //    e.g. Di2015NewLine    if (elementIndex >= lengths[childIndex]) throw new YouAreAnEvilCallerException();Di2015NewLine    int falseZeroIndex = startIndexes[childIndex];Di2015NewLine    giganticList[falseZeroIndex + elementIndex];Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public PointF GetChildValue(int childIndex, int elementIndex) {Di2015NewLine    // TODO: needs to take account of lists with no entries yet, bad child index, element indexDi2015NewLine    int falseZeroIndex = startIndexes[childIndex];Di2015NewLine    return giganticList[falseZeroIndex + elementIndex];Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public void RemoveChildArray(int childIndex) {Di2015NewLine    startIndexes.RemoveAt(childIndex);Di2015NewLine    lengths.RemoveAt(childIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // TODO: possibly record the unused segment in another pair of start, length listsDi2015NewLine    // to allow for defraging in AddChildArrayDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17111532Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> MyMethod<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IQueryable<T> entity, Di2015NewLine    string pattern, Di2015NewLine    params Expression<Func<T, string>>[] selectors)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var method = typeof(SqlFunctions).GetMethod("PatIndex");Di2015NewLine    foreach(var selector in selectors)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        var call = Expression.Call(method, Expression.Constant(pattern), selector);Di2015NewLine        var gt = Expression.GreaterThan(call, Expression.Constant(0));Di2015NewLine        var filter = Expression.Lamda(call, param);Di2015NewLine        entity = entity.Where(filter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return entity;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17114060Di2015UniqueSeparatorSelect distinct Number, MAX(Time) from MyTable group by NumberDi2015NewLine
17114060Di2015UniqueSeparatorcreate table #example(number varchar(50), id int, [time] nvarchar(50), descr nvarchar(50))Di2015NewLineinsert into #example (number, id, [time], descr) values ('Q1', 1, '10 Min', 'Shoe')Di2015NewLineinsert into #example (number, id, [time], descr) values ('Q1', 1, '15 Min', 'Car')Di2015NewLineinsert into #example (number, id, [time], descr) values  ('Q1', 1, '6 Min', 'Shirt')Di2015NewLineinsert into #example (number, id, [time], descr) values  ('L2', 1, '10 Min', 'Shoe')Di2015NewLineinsert into #example (number, id, [time], descr) values  ('P3', 2, ' 8 Min', 'Garage')Di2015NewLineinsert into #example (number, id, [time], descr) values  ('P3', 2, ' 3 Min', 'Plant')Di2015NewLineinsert into #example (number, id, [time], descr) values  ('P3', 2, '20 Min', 'Tree')Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT t1.*Di2015NewLineFROM #example AS t1Di2015NewLineLEFT OUTER JOIN #example AS t2Di2015NewLine    ON (t1.number = t2.number AND t1.[time] < t2.[time])Di2015NewLineWHERE t2.number IS NULL;Di2015NewLine--In other words: fetch the row from t1 where no other row exists with the same Number and a greater Time.Di2015NewLine

17118638Di2015UniqueSeparatorZip
17118638Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<PointF> points0 = ...Di2015NewLineIEnumerable<PointF> points0 = ...Di2015NewLinefloat x2 = ...Di2015NewLineIEnumerable<PointF> newPoints = point0.Zip(points1, Di2015NewLine    (p0, p1) => new PointF(p0.X, p0.Y + (x2-p0.X) * (p1.Y-p0.Y) / (p1.X-p0.X)));Di2015NewLine
17118638Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<double> y2values = Di2015NewLine    xValues1.Zip(yValues1, (x, y) => new { x, y }).Zip(Di2015NewLine        xValues2.Zip(yValues2, (x, y) => new { x, y }),Di2015NewLine        (p0, p1) => p0.y + (x2-p0.x) * (p1.y-p0.y) / (p1.x-p0.x));Di2015NewLine
17118638Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<double> series1X = new List<double> {   0,   2,   4,   6,  8 };Di2015NewLineList<double> series1Y = new List<double> { 120, 100, 110, 105, 70 };Di2015NewLineList<double> series2X = new List<double> {   0,   1,   7,   8,  9 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// in the worst case there are n + m new pointsDi2015NewLineList<double> newSeries1X = new List<double>(series1X.Count + series2X.Count);Di2015NewLineList<double> newSeries1Y = new List<double>(series1X.Count + series2X.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint i = 0, j = 0;Di2015NewLinefor ( ; i < series1X.Count && j < series2X.Count; )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (series1X[i] <= series2X[j])Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        newSeries1X.Add(series1X[i]);Di2015NewLine        newSeries1Y.Add(series1Y[i]);Di2015NewLine        if (series1X[i] == series2X[j])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            j++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        i++; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int k = (i == 0) ? i : i - 1;Di2015NewLine        // interpolateDi2015NewLine        double y0 = series1Y[k];Di2015NewLine        double y1 = series1Y[k + 1];Di2015NewLine        double x0 = series1X[k];Di2015NewLine        double x1 = series1X[k + 1];Di2015NewLine        double y = y0 + (y1 - y0) * (series2X[j] - x0) / (x1 - x0);Di2015NewLine        newSeries1X.Add(series2X[j]);Di2015NewLine        newSeries1Y.Add(y);Di2015NewLine        j++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinefor ( ; i < series1X.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    newSeries1X.Add(series1X[i]);Di2015NewLine    newSeries1Y.Add(series1Y[i]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinefor ( ; j < series2X.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // interpolateDi2015NewLine    double y0 = series1Y[i - 2];Di2015NewLine    double y1 = series1Y[i - 1];Di2015NewLine    double x0 = series1X[i - 2];Di2015NewLine    double x1 = series1X[i - 1];Di2015NewLine    double y = y0 + (y1 - y0) * (series2X[j] - x0) / (x1 - x0);Di2015NewLine    newSeries1X.Add(series2X[j]);Di2015NewLine    newSeries1Y.Add(y);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17118638Di2015UniqueSeparatornewSeries1X = {    0,    1,    2,    4,    6,    7,    8,    0 }Di2015NewLinenewSeries1Y = {  120,  110,  100,  110,  105, 87.5,   70, 52.5 }Di2015NewLine
17118638Di2015UniqueSeparatorseries2X[0] < series1X[0]
17118638Di2015UniqueSeparatorseries2X[n] > series1X[m]
17118638Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool hasS1 = true, hasS2 = true, preinterp = true;Di2015NewLinedouble x0 = 0, y0 = 0, x1 = 0, y1 = 0, x = 0, y = 0;Di2015NewLineusing(var s1xEnumerator = series1X.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLineusing(var s1yEnumerator = series1Y.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLineusing(var s2xEnumerator = series2X.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    hasS1 = s1xEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    hasS2 = s2xEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    s1yEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    while(hasS1 && hasS2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        x1 = s1xEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine        y1 = s1yEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine        x = s2xEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (x1 <= x)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            newSeries1X.Add(x1);Di2015NewLine            newSeries1Y.Add(y1);Di2015NewLine            hasS1 = s1xEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            s1yEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            preinterp = false;Di2015NewLine            if (hasS1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                x0 = x1;Di2015NewLine                y0 = y1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (x1 == x)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                hasS2 = s2xEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // we have to look ahead to get the next interval to interpolate before x0Di2015NewLine            if (preinterp)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                x0 = x1;Di2015NewLine                y0 = y1;Di2015NewLine                x1 = series1X[1]; // can't peek with enumeratorDi2015NewLine                y1 = series1Y[1]; Di2015NewLine                preinterp = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            y = y0 + (y1 - y0) * (x - x0) / (x1 - x0);Di2015NewLine            newSeries1X.Add(x);Di2015NewLine            newSeries1Y.Add(y);Di2015NewLine            hasS2 = s2xEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while(hasS1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        newSeries1X.Add(s1xEnumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine        newSeries1Y.Add(s1yEnumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine        hasS1 = s1xEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        s1yEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while(hasS2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        x = s2xEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine        y = y0 + (y1 - y0) * (x - x0) / (x1 - x0);Di2015NewLine        newSeries1X.Add(x);Di2015NewLine        newSeries1Y.Add(y);Di2015NewLine        hasS2 = s2xEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17118828Di2015UniqueSeparatorint[3]
17118828Di2015UniqueSeparatorlocalColourCount
17118828Di2015UniqueSeparatorcolourCount
17118828Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap image = new Bitmap(@"Input.png");Di2015NewLinevar colourCount = new int[3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineParallel.For(0, image.Width,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // localInit: The function delegate that returns the initial stateDi2015NewLine    //            of the local data for each task.Di2015NewLine    () => new int[3],Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // body: The delegate that is invoked once per iteration.Di2015NewLine    (int x, ParallelLoopState state, int[] localColourCount) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (var y = 0; y < image.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (image.GetPixel(x, y).ToArgb())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case (int)colours.red: localColourCount[0]++; break;Di2015NewLine                case (int)colours.white: localColourCount[1]++; break;Di2015NewLine                case (int)colours.black: localColourCount[2]++; break;Di2015NewLine                default: throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(Di2015NewLine                             string.Format("Unexpected colour found: '{0}'", Di2015NewLine                             image.GetPixel(x, y).ToArgb()));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    },Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // localFinally: The delegate that performs a final actionDi2015NewLine    //               on the local state of each task.Di2015NewLine    (int[] localColourCount) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Accessing shared variable; synchronize access.Di2015NewLine        lock (colourCount)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)Di2015NewLine                colourCount[i] += localColourCount[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine

17119288Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ThrottledAsyncDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Queue up multiple user actionsDi2015NewLine            // within a short interval.Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                OnUserAction();Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(10);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static int UserActionID;Di2015NewLine        private static DateTime previousWaitStartTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static async void OnUserAction()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Keep track of the operation ID.Di2015NewLine            var userActionID = Interlocked.Increment(ref UserActionID);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Pseudo-code implementation.Di2015NewLine            var timeUntilPreviousCallWillBeOrWasMade = 1000 - 17120162Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DynamicProperty<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public DynamicProperty(TypeBuilder builder, string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var field = builder.DefineField("_" + name, typeof(T), FieldAttributes.Private);Di2015NewLine        var property = builder.DefineProperty(name, PropertyAttributes.None, typeof(T), new Type[0]);Di2015NewLine        var getter = builder.DefineMethod("get_" + name, MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.SpecialName, typeof(T), new Type[0]);Di2015NewLine        var setter = builder.DefineMethod("set_" + name, MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.SpecialName, null, new Type[] { typeof(T) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var getGenerator = getter.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine        var setGenerator = setter.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        getGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        getGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, field);Di2015NewLine        getGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        setGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        setGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLine        setGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, field);Di2015NewLine        setGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        property.SetGetMethod(getter);Di2015NewLine        property.SetSetMethod(setter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17124328Di2015UniqueSeparatorOrthodrome(double,double,double,double)
17124328Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int Orthodrome(double lat1, double long1, double lat2, double long2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double Lat1 = (lat1 * Math.PI) / 180;Di2015NewLine    double Lat2 = (lat2 * Math.PI) / 180;Di2015NewLine    double Long1 = (long1 * Math.PI) / 180;Di2015NewLine    double Long2 = (long2 * Math.PI) / 180;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    distance = CalculateOrthodrome(Lat1, Lat2, Long1, Long2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return distance;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17124328Di2015UniqueSeparatorMyDistance.Orthodrome(2.3, 1.5, 2.8, 3.2);Di2015NewLine
17124328Di2015UniqueSeparatorMyDistance a = new MyDistance()
17124328Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int CalculateOrthodrome(double lat1, double long1, double lat2, double long2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (int)Math.Round(2 * 6370 * Math.Asin(Math.Sqrt((Math.Sin((Lat1 - Lat2) / 2) * Math.Sin((Lat1 - Lat2) / 2) + Math.Cos(Lat1) * Math.Cos(Lat2) * Math.Sin((Long1 - Long2) / 2) * Math.Sin((Long1 - Long2) / 2)))));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17125716Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction read(query, user, request) {Di2015NewLine    query.where(function(level, userIds) {Di2015NewLine        return this.Level === level && this.UserId in userIds; Di2015NewLine    }, request.parameters.Level, request.parameters.Friends.split(','));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    request.execute();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17125840Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> NewSplit(this string @this, int lineLength) {Di2015NewLine    var currentString = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    var currentWord = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var c in @this)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (char.IsWhiteSpace(c))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(currentString.Length + currentWord.Length > lineLength)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return currentString;Di2015NewLine                currentString = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            currentString += c + currentWord;Di2015NewLine            currentWord = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        currentWord += c;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    // The loop might have exited without flushing the last string and wordDi2015NewLine    yield return currentString; Di2015NewLine    yield return currentWord;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17125894Di2015UniqueSeparator//You have to add these using first:Di2015NewLine//using System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLine//using System.Threading;Di2015NewLine//This is used to find a windowDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32", CharSet=CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLineprivate static extern IntPtr FindWindow(string className, string windowName);Di2015NewLine//This is used to find Button in a windowDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32")]    Di2015NewLineprivate static extern IntPtr FindWindowEx(IntPtr parent, IntPtr childAfter, string className, string windowName);Di2015NewLine//This is to help you Click on a ButtonDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32")]Di2015NewLineprivate static extern int SendMessage(IntPtr hwnd, int msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);    Di2015NewLine//---------------------------Di2015NewLine//Here are our methods Di2015NewLine//---------------------------    Di2015NewLine//This is used to Get handle of a Button of a Parent window by its TextDi2015NewLineprivate IntPtr GetButton(IntPtr parent, string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   return FindWindowEx(parent, IntPtr.Zero, "Button", text);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//This is used to Click on a Window (usually a Button) with its Handle passed inDi2015NewLineprivate void ClickWindow(IntPtr hwnd)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   SendMessage(hwnd, 0x201, IntPtr.Zero, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine   SendMessage(hwnd, 0x202, IntPtr.Zero, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//This is used to find the Local Area Network (LAN) Settings windowDi2015NewLine//This is called in a separate thread, because somehow the LAN settings windowDi2015NewLine//showing causes the main Form not-responding (we can't call anything in our main thread).Di2015NewLineprivate void SearchForLanSettingsWindow()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine            IntPtr windowHandle = FindWindow(null,"Local Area Network (LAN) Settings");Di2015NewLine            if (windowHandle != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Find the button OK, if you like, you can replace it with "Cancel",...Di2015NewLine                IntPtr button = GetButton(windowHandle, "OK");Di2015NewLine                //Click on that OK button to Close your Lan settings windowDi2015NewLine                //You may want to research on the DestroyWindow or CloseWindowDi2015NewLine                //win32 api without having to click on a Button, but I think this should be better. It's up to you.Di2015NewLine                ClickWindow(button);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine            if (i > 20)//timeoutDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//And here is your code with my code appendedDi2015NewLineSystem.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo proc = new System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo();Di2015NewLineproc.FileName = @"C:\\\\Windows\\\\System32\\\\RunDll32.exe";Di2015NewLineproc.Arguments = "shell32.dll,Control_RunDLL inetcpl.cpl,Internet,4";//open Internet Properties window        Di2015NewLineproc.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLineSystem.Diagnostics.Process.Start(proc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineThread.Sleep(100);//Sleep to be sure the Window is really createdDi2015NewLine//Get the handle to the window "Internet Properties"Di2015NewLineIntPtr mainHandle = FindWindow(null, "Internet Properties");Di2015NewLine//Find the tab "Connections", this tab has class "#32770" and is a child window of the window "Internet Properties"Di2015NewLineIntPtr child = FindWindowEx(mainHandle, IntPtr.Zero, "#32770", "Connections");Di2015NewLine//Get the button "LAN settings"Di2015NewLineIntPtr button = GetButton(child, "&LAN settings");Di2015NewLine//Create new thread and start it to find the Lan settings window Di2015NewLine//we have to do this now because for some reason, after the LAN settings window showsDi2015NewLine//we can't call any code in our class.Di2015NewLinenew Thread(SearchForLanSettingsWindow).Start();Di2015NewLine//Click on the LAN settings button to Show the LAN settings windowDi2015NewLineClickWindow(button);Di2015NewLine//Get the button OK on the window "Internet Properties"Di2015NewLinebutton = GetButton(mainHandle, "OK");Di2015NewLine//Click on that button to close the window "Internet Properties"Di2015NewLineClickWindow(button);Di2015NewLine

17129448Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class Enumeration : IComparableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly int _value;Di2015NewLine    private readonly string _displayName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected Enumeration()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected Enumeration(int value, string displayName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _value = value;Di2015NewLine        _displayName = displayName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string DisplayNameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _displayName; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return DisplayName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> GetAll<T>() where T : Enumeration, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        var fields = type.GetFields(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var info in fields)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var instance = new T();Di2015NewLine            var locatedValue = info.GetValue(instance) as T;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (locatedValue != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return locatedValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var otherValue = obj as Enumeration;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (otherValue == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var typeMatches = GetType().Equals(obj.GetType());Di2015NewLine        var valueMatches = _value.Equals(otherValue.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return typeMatches && valueMatches;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _value.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int AbsoluteDifference(Enumeration firstValue, Enumeration secondValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var absoluteDifference = Math.Abs(firstValue.Value - secondValue.Value);Di2015NewLine        return absoluteDifference;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T FromValue<T>(int value) where T : Enumeration, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var matchingItem = parse<T, int>(value, "value", item => item.Value == value);Di2015NewLine        return matchingItem;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T FromDisplayName<T>(string displayName) where T : Enumeration, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var matchingItem = parse<T, string>(displayName, "display name", item => item.DisplayName == displayName);Di2015NewLine        return matchingItem;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static T parse<T, K>(K value, string description, Func<T, bool> predicate) where T : Enumeration, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var matchingItem = GetAll<T>().FirstOrDefault(predicate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (matchingItem == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var message = string.Format("'{0}' is not a valid {1} in {2}", value, description, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return matchingItem;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int CompareTo(object other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Value.CompareTo(((Enumeration)other).Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17137218Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace RsaCryptoExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  static class ProgramDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //lets take a new CSP with a new 2048 bit rsa key pairDi2015NewLine      var csp = new RSACryptoServiceProvider(2048);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //how to get the private keyDi2015NewLine      var privKey = csp.ExportParameters(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //and the public key ...Di2015NewLine      var pubKey = csp.ExportParameters(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //converting the public key into a string representationDi2015NewLine      string pubKeyString;Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        //we need some bufferDi2015NewLine        var sw = new System.IO.StringWriter();Di2015NewLine        //we need a serializerDi2015NewLine        var xs = new System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer(typeof(RSAParameters));Di2015NewLine        //serialize the key into the streamDi2015NewLine        xs.Serialize(sw, pubKey);Di2015NewLine        //get the string from the streamDi2015NewLine        pubKeyString = sw.ToString();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //converting it backDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        //get a stream from the stringDi2015NewLine        var sr = new System.IO.StringReader(pubKeyString);Di2015NewLine        //we need a deserializerDi2015NewLine        var xs = new System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer(typeof(RSAParameters));Di2015NewLine        //get the object back from the streamDi2015NewLine        pubKey = (RSAParameters)xs.Deserialize(sr);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //conversion for the private key is no black magic either ... omittedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //we have a public key ... let's get a new csp and load that keyDi2015NewLine      csp = new RSACryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine      csp.ImportParameters(pubKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //we need some data to encryptDi2015NewLine      var plainTextData = "foobar";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //for encryption, always handle bytes...Di2015NewLine      var bytesPlainTextData = System.Text.Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(plainTextData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //apply pkcs#1.5 padding and encrypt our data Di2015NewLine      var bytesCypherText = csp.Encrypt(bytesPlainTextData, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //we might want a string representation of our cypher text... base64 will doDi2015NewLine      var cypherText = Convert.ToBase64String(bytesCypherText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      /*Di2015NewLine       * some transmission / storage / retrievalDi2015NewLine       * Di2015NewLine       * and we want to decrypt our cypherTextDi2015NewLine       */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //first, get our bytes back from the base64 string ...Di2015NewLine      bytesCypherText = Convert.FromBase64String(cypherText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //we want to decrypt, therefore we need a csp and load our private keyDi2015NewLine      csp = new RSACryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine      csp.ImportParameters(privKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //decrypt and strip pkcs#1.5 paddingDi2015NewLine      bytesPlainTextData = csp.Decrypt(bytesCypherText, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //get our original plainText back...Di2015NewLine      plainTextData = System.Text.Encoding.Unicode.GetString(bytesPlainTextData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
